participant_1.background:
I've been single for a while now because I'm too focused on my career.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
My job is secure and I get paid well.
My parents were very supportive of my interests and hobbies.
I'm a safari guide who loves to read in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
i am angry at my coworker.
I was once in love with a florist's son, but it couldn't work out because of my mother.
I need to balance my work and family life.

content.text: I'm doing okay. I'm a bit stressed out because I have a lot to do at work, but other than that I'm good.
Yeah, I know how that feels. I'm a safari guide and sometimes I have to work really long hours. It can be exhausting, but it's also very rewarding.
That sounds like an amazing job! I'm a florist, so I spend a lot of time working with flowers. It's nice to be able to create beautiful things, but it can also be a lot of work.
Yeah, I can imagine. I'm lucky that I get to work outside most of the time. I love being in nature.
Me too! I love going on walks in the park with my dog. He's a golden retriever named Buddy.
Aww, golden retrievers are the best! I used to have one named Bailey.
They're so sweet and friendly. I love taking Buddy to the dog park.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you have such a great dog.
Thanks, I love him to death. What about you, are you single or in a relationship?
I've been single for a while now. I'm too focused on my career to have a relationship right now.
I know how that feels. I was single for a long time before I met my boyfriend.
We met at a party. We were both friends with the same people, and we just hit it off.
That's great! I'm glad you found someone.
